title: Coulthard: 'George Harrison played me unheard Bernie Ecclestone F1 song'
summary: Former McLaren F1 ace toldJames Elsonabout his private audience with The Beatles' George Harrison, who played an unreleased grand prix-themed song

qa_pairs.question: Which former McLaren driver had a private audience with George Harrison?
What famous band was George Harrison a part of?
Who was the long-time F1 commercial rights holder known for his influence on the sport?
